name: VIDEO: County Doctors Share Tips for Fighting Winter Viruses
description: San Diego County doctors share the top 5 tips for fighting winter viruses.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
Building a good defense will help prevent severe illness and hospitalization from the flu, COVID-19, and respiratory syncytial virus (RSV). San Diego County doctors share the top 5 tips for fighting winter viruses.
For more information visit the San Diego County Immunization Unit.
